mapper.select: select INVOICE_ID, LINE_NUMBER, PROJECT_NUM, VENDOR_NAME, INVOICE_TYPE, GL_DATE, INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE, CR_AMOUNT, CR_BASE_AMOUNT, null REQUEST_ID, null PROGRAM_ID, null OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, null CREATED_BY, null CREATION_DATE, null LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, null LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN from cux_Dt_acct_pay_in_advance_v2@ebs_db purchase where purchase.LAST_UPDATE_DATE >= #{lastUpdateDate}

select purchase.PURCHASE_ID, purchase.INVOICE_ID, purchase.LINE_NUMBER, purchase.PROJECT_NUM, purchase.VENDOR_NAME, purchase.INVOICE_TYPE, purchase.GL_DATE, purchase.INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE, purchase.CR_AMOUNT, purchase.CR_BASE_AMOUNT,
from HCUX_EPS_PURCHASE_DETAIL purchase where purchase.INVOICE_ID=#{invoiceId} and purchase.LINE_NUMBER=#{lineNumber}

select purchase.PURCHASE_ID, purchase.INVOICE_ID, purchase.LINE_NUMBER, purchase.PROJECT_NUM, purchase.VENDOR_NAME, decode(purchase.INVOICE_TYPE, 'Standard', '标准', 'Credit Memo', '贷项通知单', INVOICE_TYPE) INVOICE_TYPE, purchase.GL_DATE, purchase.INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE, purchase.CR_AMOUNT, purchase.CR_BASE_AMOUNT,
from HCUX_EPS_PURCHASE_DETAIL purchase
and lower(PROJECT_NUM) like '%'|| lower(#{projectNum}) ||'%'
and lower(PROJECT_NUM) >= lower(#{projectNumFrom})
and lower(PROJECT_NUM) <= lower(#{projectNumTo})
and VENDOR_NAME like '%'||#{vendorName}||'%'
and to_char(GL_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') >= to_char(#{glDateFrom,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd')
and to_char(GL_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') <= to_char(#{glDateTo,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd')
AND (purchase.CR_AMOUNT != 0 AND purchase.CR_BASE_AMOUNT != 0) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM HCUX_EPS_PROJECT_NUM HEPN WHERE purchase.PROJECT_NUM = HEPN.PROJECT_NUM)
order by purchase.GL_DATE desc,purchase.PURCHASE_ID desc

select purchase.INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE, ROUND(sum(purchase.CR_AMOUNT),2) TOTAL_AMOUNT from HCUX_EPS_PURCHASE_DETAIL purchase
and lower(PROJECT_NUM) like '%'|| lower(#{projectNum}) ||'%'
and lower(PROJECT_NUM) >= lower(#{projectNumFrom})
and lower(PROJECT_NUM) <= lower(#{projectNumTo})
and VENDOR_NAME like '%'||#{vendorName}||'%'
and to_char(GL_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') >= to_char(#{glDateFrom,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd')
and to_char(GL_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') <= to_char(#{glDateTo,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd')
AND (purchase.CR_AMOUNT != 0 AND purchase.CR_BASE_AMOUNT != 0) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM HCUX_EPS_PROJECT_NUM HEPN WHERE purchase.PROJECT_NUM = HEPN.PROJECT_NUM)
GROUP BY purchase.INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE
select sum(CR_BASE_AMOUNT) SUM_CR_BASE_AMOUNT from HCUX_EPS_PURCHASE_DETAIL purchase where PROJECT_NUM=#{projectNum}
